amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $15 million appropriated for the Next Generation High Speed Rail Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 11 in the Congressional Record of July 19, 1995, to eliminate the $15 million in funds appropriated in the bill for high-speed rail projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 101 - 313 (Roll no. 561).
